name: timorousness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being nervous and without confidence : He has a touching mixture of timorousness and courage. I was a determined young man who longed to conquer his own timorousness. See
timorous
More examplesFewer examplesBeneath that timorousness there's the remains of a person who had once been assured, strong, brave. There was in him a mixture of pride and stubborn timorousness.It is only our timorousness and lack of imagination which keep us from producing the plays.
